title: instrument made under such Act and relating to the administration and business
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Youth Work (Transfer of Departmental
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Youth Work (Transfer of Departmental 

Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2025. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 May 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited youth work (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2025 (2) order come operation 1 may 2025

title: instrument made under such Act and relating to the administration and business
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

(2) References to the Department of Education contained in any Act or any 
instrument made under such Act and relating to the administration and business 
transferred by paragraph (1) shall, on and after the commencement of this Order, 
be construed as references to the Department of Children, Equality, Disability, 
Integration and Youth.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department child equality disability integration youth (2) reference department education contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department child equality disability integration youth

title: instrument made under such Act and relating to the administration and business
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Education by or under section
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Education by or under section 
18(4)(d) of the Youth Work Act 2001 (No. 42 of 2001) are transferred to the 
Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth. 

(2) References to the Minister for Education contained in any Act or 
instrument made under such Act and relating to any functions transferred by this 
Article shall, on and after the commencement of this Order, be construed as 
references to the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth.
text_norm: 3 (1) function vested minister education section 18(4)(d) youth work act 2001 (no 42 2001) transferred minister child equality disability integration youth (2) reference minister education contained act instrument made act relating function transferred article shall commencement order construed reference minister child equality disability integration youth

title: instrument made under such Act and relating to the administration and business
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Education is a party and the 
proceedings have reference to functions transferred by this Order to the Minister 
for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth, the name of the 
Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth shall, in so far 
as the proceedings relate to any function transferred by this Order, be substituted 
in the proceedings for that of the Minister for Education or added in the 
proceedings, as may be appropriate, and the proceedings shall not abate by 
reason of such substitution.
text_norm: 4 immediately commencement order legal proceeding pending minister education party proceeding reference function transferred order minister child equality disability integration youth name minister child equality disability integration youth shall far proceeding relate function transferred order substituted proceeding minister education added proceeding may appropriate proceeding shall abate reason substitution

title: instrument made under such Act and relating to the administration and business
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Education may, in so far as it relates to

functions transferred by this Order to the Minister for Children, Equality,

commencement by the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration 
and Youth.

title: instrument made under such Act and relating to the administration and business
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in 
the exercise of a function transferred by this Order shall, if and in so far as it was 
operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, have effect on 
and after such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the Minister 
for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made exercise function transferred order shall far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister child equality disability integration youth

title: instrument made under such Act and relating to the administration and business
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Education contained in the constitution of
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Education contained in the constitution of 
any company and relating to any function transferred by this Order shall, on and 
after the commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the Minister 
for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth.
text_norm: 7 reference minister education contained constitution company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister child equality disability integration youth

title: instrument made under such Act and relating to the administration and business
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the 
commencement of this Order by the Minister for Education in connection with 
the functions transferred by this Order are transferred on the commencement to 
the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth and, 
accordingly, without any further conveyance, transfer or assignment – 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

the property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth, 

those rights are rights of the Minister for Children, Equality, 
Disability, Integration and Youth, and 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Children, 
Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth by this Article which, on 
the commencement of this Order, are standing in the name of the Minister for 
Education shall, on the request of the Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, 
Integration and Youth, be transferred into the name of the Minister for Children, 
Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
 of the Government, 
29 April, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
